Amy Jackson Looks Stunning In These Beautiful Pictures
Amy Jackson Looks Stunning In These Beautiful Pictures
Amy Jackson has been playing some decent roles in the Bollywood industry. A British model and actress, she has mostly done Hindi and Tamil cinema. She started modelling at the age of 16 and went on to win the 2009 Miss Teen World competition. She also has the title of Miss Liverpool to her name which she won in 2010. She was spotted by Tamil film director AL Vijay and gave her a break in the 2010 Tamil period-drama film Madrasapattinam. Ekk Deewana Tha (2012) was her first hindi film which got her mixed reviews.
The same year saw Amy saw the release of her first Telugu film Yevadu. She also starred in Aneez Bazmee's directorial Singh is Bling in 2015.

title: Amy Jackson Looks Stunning In These Beautiful Pictures
description: Amy Louise Jackson is a British model and actress, who appears in Indian films, primarily Hindi and Tamil cinema. Jackson began modelling at age of 16, going on to win the 2009 Miss Teen World competition and the 2010 Miss Liverpool title. Subsequently Tamil film director A L Vijay spotted her and introduced Jackson as an actress in the 2010 Tamil period-drama Madrasapattinam.
